title: A leading kids safety bill has been poison pilled, supporters say
description: Last year, the House of Representatives was the place where a leading kids online safety bill came to die. On Tuesday, a powerful House committee positioned itself as the place where that bill could be resurrected… along with 18 other proposals. During a thre…
content: Advocates warn that overriding state laws is worse than doing nothing at all. Advocates warn that overriding state laws is worse than doing nothing at all. by … [+12217 chars]
